|goon=つう
|kanon=とう

|nanori=あい, あがり, あきら, こ, こち, さき, しの, はじめ, はる, ひが, もと
}}

{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=kanon|とう}}

subSections.title: See also
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|風牌|かぜハイ|[[wind]] [[tile]]s}}: {{ja-r|東|トン|'''east wind'''}}, {{ja-r|南|ナン|[[south wind]]}}, {{ja-r|西|シャー|[[west wind]]}}, {{ja-r|北|ペー|[[north wind]]}}

subSections.title: Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|とん}}

# {{surname|lang=ja|A=a|nodot=1|sort=とん}}

subSections.title: Etymology 7
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=i}}

Nominalization of the stem of adjective {{m|ja|明らか|tr=akiraka||[[clear]]}}.

subSections.title: Proper noun
Etymology 8
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=i}}

Nominalization of verb {{m|ja|[[上る]], [[登る]]|tr=noboru||to [[ascend]], [[rise]]}}.

subSections.title: Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|のぼる}}

# {{given name|male|lang=ja|A=a|nodot=1|sort=のぼる}}

subSections.title: Etymology 9
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=i}}

Nominalization of the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{m|ja|始める|tr=hajimeru||to [[begin]], [[start]]}}.
